body_html:
We observed the same issues with many other kinds of CNNs, both in our own code and the pytorch examples.

For example, launching a resnet101 training on ImageNet with https://github.com/pytorch/examples/blob/master/imagenet/main.py on four Titan Xp works with v0.2 but immediately goes out of memory with master.
body_text:
We observed the same issues with many other kinds of CNNs, both in our own code and the pytorch examples.
For example, launching a resnet101 training on ImageNet with https://github.com/pytorch/examples/blob/master/imagenet/main.py on four Titan Xp works with v0.2 but immediately goes out of memory with master.
body:
We observed the same issues with many other kinds of CNNs, both in our own code and the pytorch examples.

For example, launching a resnet101 training on ImageNet with https://github.com/pytorch/examples/blob/master/imagenet/main.py on four Titan Xp works with v0.2 but immediately goes out of memory with master.
